machine_extruder_start_code.default_value:
;WIPE
;G90
G1 X 655 Y-80 F7000
M105
M109 S{material_print_temperature, 1}
G92 E-{switch_extruder_retraction_amount}

G92 E0
;switch_extruder_retraction_amount:{switch_extruder_retraction_amount}
G90
G1 X613 F7000
G1 X655
G1 X613
G1 X655
;endTC
